author: MSNBC.com
title: Chris: GOP doesn’t seem to care who gets Covid—so long as Barrett gets on the Supreme Court

author: MSNBC.com
title: ‘Hypocrisy 101’: Ex-Covid Task Force official on Trump ad using Fauci out of context

author: MSNBC.com
title: Getting involved in the 2020 election? Time to hit the 'go' button!
description: With just a smidge over three weeks left before Election Day, Rachel Maddow encourages viewers to get involved in whatever aspect of the election they care about to avoid regretting not having done more on the morning of the election.

author: MSNBC.com
title: Fauci calls out Team Trump for using him out of context in ad

author: MSNBC.com
title: Georgia officials claim voter enthusiasm is behind hours-long lines

title: Biden blasts 'reckless' Trump as president holds packed rally

author: MSNBC.com
title: Covid spike, looming flu season, staff shortages: Hospitals feel pressure in North Dakota

author: MSNBC.com
title: At rally, Trump talks of taking risks

author: MSNBC.com
title: Biden says he is not a fan of expanding Supreme Court

author: MSNBC.com
title: Trump holds his first rally since coronavirus diagnosis

title: Rep. Hoyer: If Trump stays on target, more relief is possible

title: Durbin questions Barrett on difference between a felon's right to vote or own a gun

title: Barrett: 'I am not hostile' to the Affordable Care Act

author: MSNBC.com
title: What made John McCain 'The Luckiest Man'

title: Barrett says she has made no precommitments on Supreme Court cases or Obamacare
